snippet: Local residents and rescue workers saw smoldering debris litter miles of sparsely populated Ukrainian farmland after Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 crashed.
abstract: Many of the bodies strewn about in smoldering wreckage of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17, which exploded over eastern Ukraine, are largely intact; local residents speak of seeing bodies falling from the sky before the plane came to a jolting rest in a large wheat field, having trailed debris over several miles of farmland.
lead_paragraph: Local residents and rescue workers saw smoldering debris litter miles of sparsely populated Ukrainian farmland after Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 crashed.

headline.seo: Malaysia Airlines Plane Leaves Trail of Debris
headline.main: Fallen Bodies, Jet Parts and a Child’s Pink Book
headline.print_headline: Fallen Bodies, Jet Parts and a Child’s Pink Book
